name: Halloween Spooktacular
author: ShadowGov Team
description: A spooky, pumpkin-spiced conspiracy expansion with tabloids, crypts, and candy-fueled chaos. 200 cards total: 100 per faction.

cards.name: Graveyard Flyer Protocol
cards.text: Force a stumble or draw momentum. Blink-and-you-miss-it ploy.
cards.flavor: Someone left the portal open again.

cards.name: Spider Scare Incident
cards.text: Force a stumble or draw momentum. Immediate spooky shenanigans.
cards.flavor: Bring a flashlight and plausible deniability.

cards.name: Cauldron Whispers Incident
cards.text: Opponent loses 4 IP. Numbers go bump in the night.

cards.name: Ouija Shuffle Incident
cards.text: Block next attack or gain temporary immunity. Barricade of blessed salt.
cards.flavor: Approved by the Council of Shadows.

cards.name: Report of the Fog Machine
cards.text: Force a stumble or draw momentum. Happens faster than a jump scare.
cards.flavor: Someone left the portal open again.

cards.text: Truth - 7%. Broadcast rocks the night.

cards.text: Block next attack or gain temporary immunity. Circle of protection holds.
